    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public static boolean delete​(java.io.File file,
                             SecureDeleteEvent event)
        Add file to Secure Delete queue and begin delete on a separate thread The result of the normal deletion is returned synchronously while the result of the data overwrite process is returned in a callback event
        Parameters:
        file - The file to delete
        event - Callback event on secure delete completion (default: null)
        Returns:
        True if the file is deleted

      • delete

        Parameters:
        uid - Deleted file UID

        public static int getRemaining()
        Return remaining pending file deletions

      • deleteDirectory

        public static boolean deleteDirectory​(java.io.File dir,
                                      boolean contentsOnly,
                                      boolean recursive)
        Delete directory and containing files
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to delete
        contentsOnly - Only delete files (default: false)
        recursive - Delete sub-folders (default: true)
        Returns:
        True if everything was deleted successfully

      • deleteDirectory

        public static boolean deleteDirectory​(java.io.File dir,
                                      boolean contentsOnly,
                                      boolean recursive,
                                      java.io.FilenameFilter ignore)
        Delete directory and containing files
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to delete
        contentsOnly - Only delete files (default: false)
        recursive - Delete sub-folders (default: true)
        ignore - [optional] filter to ignore/skip, not delete matching files
        Returns:
        True if everything was deleted successfully

        Securely erase a database
        Parameters:
        dbHandle - SQLite database handle
        Returns:
        True if database file was deleted
